entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
